about_the_game:
Hey you!

Yeah you!

Do you ever wonder how video games are made?

(Sometimes we do, too)

Well, these are the sketch versions of the Midterms outfits. A totally barebones and incomplete outfit for EVERY party member, including the secret ones.

TO ACCESS: Go to the storage area in the Engine Room, and click on Corrupted Power Runes.
